message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not sure I can go that high. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
I understand you're looking for a fair price, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I'm glad we're still in negotiation! I understand you're trying to stay within your budget. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can sell it to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and make a deal.
